metadata.title: CVE-2022-37035 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in bgpd in FRRouting (FRR) 8.3. Inbgp_notify_send_with_data() and bgp_process_packet() in bgp_packet.c, thereis a possible use-after-free due to a race condition. This could lead toRemote Code Execution or Information Disclosure by sending crafted BGPpackets. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: frr package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
